from notebookutils import mssparkutils
path_to_file = "abfss://odw-config@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/schema_creation/"
file = mssparkutils.fs.ls(path_to_file)
path_to_target = "abfss://odw-config@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/standardised_table_definitions/Timesheets/"

import pandas as pd
import json
import re

jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
mssparkutils.fs.unmount("/schema") 
mssparkutils.fs.unmount("/source") 
mssparkutils.fs.unmount("/target") 
mssparkutils.fs.mount(path_to_file, 
"/source", 
{"linkedService":"ls_storage"} 
)   
mssparkutils.fs.mount(path_to_target, 
"/target", 
{"linkedService":"ls_storage"} 
)   
for fi in file:
    f = fi.path
    print(f)
    if '.csv' in f:
        ext = '.csv'
        filename = f.split("/")[-1]
        df = pd.read_csv(f"/synfs/{jobId}/source/{filename}", quotechar='"',escapechar='\\',encoding="utf8",dtype=str)
    elif '.xlsx' in f:
        ext = '.xlsx'
        filename = f.split("/")[-1]
        df = pd.read_excel(f"/synfs/{jobId}/source/{filename}", dtype=str)
    else:
        continue
    df = df.loc[:, ~df.columns.str.contains('^Unnamed')]
    cols_orig = list(df.columns)
    cols=[re.sub('[^0-9a-zA-Z]+', '_', i).lower() for i in cols_orig]
    cols=[colm.rstrip('_') for colm in cols]
    newlist = []
    for i, v in enumerate(cols):
        totalcount = cols.count(v)
        count = cols[:i].count(v)
        newlist.append(v + str(count + 1) if totalcount > 1 else v)

    jsonex = {"fields":[
            {
            "metadata": {},
            "name": "ingested_datetime",
            "type": "timestamp",
            "nullable": False
            },
            {
            "metadata": {},
            "name": "expected_from",
            "type": "timestamp",
            "nullable": False
            },
            {
            "metadata": {},
            "name": "expected_to",
            "type": "timestamp",
            "nullable": False
            }]}
    for col in newlist:
        obj = {
            "metadata": {},
            "name": col,
            "type": "string",
            "nullable": True
            }
        jsonex['fields'].append(obj)
    filename_no_ext = f.split("/")[-1].split(ext)[0]
    json_to_write = json.dumps(jsonex)
    f = open(f"/synfs/{jobId}/target/{filename_no_ext}.json", "w")
    f.write(json_to_write)
    f.close()
